document.full_text: the men's and women's singles champions at the french open will each receive $1.7 million, up from about $1.4 million last year.
document.title: sports briefing | tennis: french open singles winners will each receive $1.7 million
lines_and_colors: the men's and women's singles champions at the french open will each receive $1.7 million, up from about $1.4 million last year.
